resources.string: The athlete gets a credit bonus at the Stadium for the Bench Press Minigame
The engineer gets a credit bonus at the Physics Building for the Wires Minigame
Gradugator gets a credit bonus in Turlington for the Whack-A-Flyer Minigame
Player %1$s has earned %2$d credits! You are ready to graduate. Please head to the O\'Connell Center!
Tap the screen as fast as possible to make your character do reps.
You need to finish %1$d reps in 10 seconds to earn the credits for this minigame.
Congratulations! You finished %1$d reps in 10 seconds. You have earned %2$d credits!
Sorry! You only finished %1$d reps in 10 seconds. You did not earn any credits!

The main goal of Gradugation is to graduate, of course! Begin the game by selecting a preferred character. Afterwards, you will see the main game board. After a dice roll determines your turn, you may begin on the path to graduation. The number that the dice rolls determines the number of squares your character may move. Use your finger to drag your character across the screen. If your character visits a building, he or she can take courses in the form of minigames to accumulate credits.

The purpose of this game is to find the end of a wire, the number of which is specified by the dialogue box at the beginning of the wires game. The time allotted to to the player is not very long, so be quick!
Quickly tap the screen, right onto the dapper, weight-lifting engineer on the screen to perform as many reps as possible in the allotted time.
You have 16 seconds to make it through the Hub to get to class! Touch the screen to stop your character from moving. Watch out for other students! If you hit them, you won\'t make it to class!
Congradugation! You made it through the Hub in time to earn %1$d credits!
Oh no! You didn\'t make it through the Hub in time to earn credits!
Oh no! You hit someone and didn\'t make it to class in time!
Congradugations! You whacked %1$d flyers. You have earned %2$d credits!
Sorry! You only whacked %1$d flyers. You did not earn any credits!
Oh no! It\'s noon in turlington plaza, and people are handing out flyers! In order to get through turlington plaza, you need to whack %1$d flyers! Whack them by tapping on them. Good luck!
Congradugations! You answered %1$d out of %2$d correctly. You have earned %3$d credits!
Sorry! You only answered %1$d out of %2$d correctly. You did not earn any credits!

You\'re part of a psychological experiment to see if you\'re smarter than the average chimpanzee. For every word on the screen, select the color that matches the color of the text. You need to get more than %1$d%% correct. Good luck!
